meta.title: Reservation Module
meta.description: Reservation Module is a module that allows you to manage your reservations. You can view the details of your booking, track its status, cancel your booking, or edit your booking.
meta.keywords: Reservation Module, Turistik Rota, Vacation Planning, Tour Reservation

head.title: Turistikrota Reservation
head.subtitle: Turistikrota Booking allows businesses to manage their reservations. Business owners can promote their businesses, receive reservations for their businesses, and manage their businesses with Turistikrota Booking.

whatsapp.title: Reservation with WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Make reservations with WhatsApp via Turistikrota. Contact businesses directly and make your reservation quickly.

calendar.title: Calendar Integration
calendar.description: Integrate your reservations with your calendar via Turistikrota. Track your reservations and organize your plans.

custom-pos.title: Custom POS Integration
custom-pos.description: Make special POS integration via Turistikrota. Receive your payments quickly with POS integration special for your business.

social.title: Social Stream
social.description: Share your reservations made via Turistikrota in our social module. Share something or see who your loved ones are traveling with.

centers.title: Turkey's Top Spots
centers.subtitle: Discover Turkey's most popular spots. From the pearl of the Aegean, Izmir, to the historical heart of Istanbul, the warm beaches of the Mediterranean to the enchanting landscapes of Cappadocia, our destinations cater to every taste.

descriptions.buyukada: Istanbul's enchanting island, B√ºy√ºkada, offers a memorable escape with its historic mansions and serene nature walks.
descriptions.sapanca: Where green meets blue, Sapanca is an ideal stop for a peaceful break by the lake and nature activities.
descriptions.odunpazari: The historical heart of Eski≈üehir, Odunpazarƒ±, takes visitors on a journey through time with its colorful Ottoman houses and art galleries.
descriptions.sile: A getaway near Istanbul, ≈ûile is a coastal town filled with natural beauty, boasting wide beaches and a lighthouse.
descriptions.kartepe: Popular for winter sports and nature hikes, Kartepe captivates with its stunning views and fresh mountain air.
descriptions.karasu: The coastal town of Karasu in Sakarya promises a perfect summer holiday with its long sandy beaches and clean sea.
descriptions.bebek: The pearl of the Bosphorus, Bebek Beach, is one of Istanbul's most popular meeting spots, known for its stunning views and stylish caf√©s.

meta.title: Turistik Rota | Vacation Planning | Tour Booking
meta.description: Turistik Rota is a website that specializes in vacation planning, travel advice, unexplored routes and travel guidance. We offer unexplored routes in different categories such as culture, nature, city and adventure tourism for your domestic and international travels. Follow our site for accommodation options, tour bookings and guidance on travel matters!
meta.keywords: Vacation planning, travel suggestions, travel guide, tourist routes, undiscovered places, Domestic vacation, International vacation, Cultural tourism, Nature tourism, City tourism, Adventure tourism, Family vacation, Romantic vacation, Sea vacation

head.title: Real Tourism Experience is at Turistikrota
head.subtitle: Turistikrota is a platform that allows you to have the best tourism experience around the world and share this experience with other people.

count.title: Best for everyone
count.subtitle: While Turistikrota provides its customers with a real tourism experience, it also provides great convenience to its business partners.

whyPerfect.title: Why Perfect?
whyPerfect.subtitle: While offering various opportunities to travel enthusiasts, Turistikrota also allows users to share their experiences.

social.title: Social
social.text: Visitors on Turistikrota can interact with each other, share their travel experiences, and exchange information about travel-related topics.

safe.title: Safe
safe.text: Turistikrota offers advanced security measures to ensure the safety of travelers and hosts.

worldwide.title: Worldwide
worldwide.text: Turistikrota enables people from all over the world to interact with each other. Meet and travel with people from everywhere in the world.

card.title: Our Team
card.subtitle: Turistikrota team consists of people who ensure the existence and sustainability of this entire site.

ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.subtitle: Learn about the mission and vision of Turistikrota.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: Our vision as Turistikrota is to provide innovative solutions in the tourism sector and ensure that people accumulate happy memories.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Our mission as Turistikrota is to ensure that people experience real tourism and share this experience with others.

values.title: Values
values.text: Our values as Turistikrota are customer satisfaction, innovation, reliability, and quality.

ourModules.title: Our Modules
ourModules.subtitle: Explore Turistikrota by modules. Each module represents a different feature of Turistikrota.

places.title: Places Module
places.text: Provides tourist places with all their details. Tourist places include historical places, natural beauties, cities, towns, and more.

listing.title: Accommodation Module
listing.text: Provides accommodation options by location, date range, and price. Accommodation options include hotels, hostels, homes, campsites, and more.

support.title: Support Module
support.text: Allows you to get support for reservations made through Turistikrota or any problems encountered on Turistikrota. With this module, you can reach the Turistikrota support team.

booking.title: Booking Module
booking.text: Allows you to track and manage your bookings. You can view the details of your booking, track its status, cancel your booking, or edit your booking.

business.title: Business Module
business.text: Allows business owners to promote their businesses and manage their businesses. Business owners can promote their businesses on Turistikrota, get bookings for their businesses, and manage their businesses.

account.title: Account Module
account.text: Allows users to manage their Turistikrota accounts. Users can edit their Turistikrota accounts, request to delete their Turistikrota accounts, and delete their Turistikrota accounts.

tech.title: Technology Module
tech.text: Introduces the Turistikrota technology team. Our technology team is working on the development and sustainability of Turistikrota.

payment.title: Payment Module
payment.text: Allows you to make all payments you make through Turistikrota. You can view your past and current payments, manage your payment methods, and update your payment methods.

social.title: Social Module
social.text: Allows you to interact with other people on Turistikrota. Share something or see who your loved ones are traveling with.

ad.title: Advertising Module
ad.text: Allows businesses to advertise on Turistikrota and manage these ads. Business owners can advertise on Turistikrota and manage their ads.

tour.title: Tour Module
tour.text: Allows you to travel with other people. You can create a tour on Turistikrota or book a tour.

ticket.title: Ticket Module
ticket.text: We are going beyond tourism and also offering you cultural and artistic events. You can create an event on Turistikrota or buy a ticket for an event.

meta.title: About Us
meta.description: Turistik Rota is a platform that allows you to experience the best tourism experience worldwide and share this experience with other people.
meta.keywords: tourist route, tourist route, about us, about tourist route, about tourist route
